Sentencas: Internal steam reforming is an attractive option offering a significantly cost reduction and higher system efficiencies of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) power plant.
Titulo: Reforming of natural gas in solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: Furthermore, faster load response may characterise systems with internal reforming.
Titulo: Reforming of natural gas in solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: However, complete internal reforming can lead to several problems, which can be avoided with partial pre-reforming of natural gas.
Titulo: Reforming of natural gas in solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: For SOFC systems the ratio between internal and pre-reforming has to be optimised on the basis of experimental performance data.
Titulo: Reforming of natural gas in solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: A detailed study concerning the pre-reforming in a reformer of considerable size (10 kW) is carried out.
Titulo: Reforming of natural gas in solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: The influence of operating temperature and mass How variations on conversion of methane and ethane is analysed.
Titulo: Reforming of natural gas in solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: During internal reforming of methane with substrate anodes, large temperature gradients were detected.
Titulo: Reforming of natural gas in solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: Substrate samples with low catalytic activity show large response times with respect to parameter variations.
Titulo: Reforming of natural gas in solid oxide fuel cell systems
